Name: Before Akhira
About the game: عن ابن عباس قال: قال رسول الله صلى الله علیھ و سلم 'اعتنم خمسا قبل خمس: شبابك قبل ھرمك و صحتك قبل سقمك و غناك قبل فقرك و فراغك قبل شغلك و حیاتك قبل موتك Ibn Abbas reported: The Messenger of Allah, peace and blessings be upon him, said, “Take advantage of five before five: your youth before your old age, your health before your illness, your riches before your poverty, your free time before your work, and your life before your death.” Journey into the world of Before Akhira to help a young dreamer awaken and return to the real world. Explore the metaphors of Islamic spirituality as you rediscover the afterlife of the virtual world. features: 2D platforming adventure Open-world exploration Original art, soundtrack, and story Surrealist environments filled with metaphors and hidden meanings Spiritual journey and reflection Explore what is truly important and how to make the most with what you have Have fun!
